cliArguments.clear: Clears the element value, before typing into it.
cliArguments.down: Array of keys to press down while sending keys (use to simulate [CRTL+A], [CTRL+SHIFT+DELETE], etc.
cliArguments.forceClear: Clears the element value using [BACKSPACE] key, performing the clearing using real keyboard actions. This action is not supported by [Mobile Native] applications.
cliArguments.interval: The interval time between each character typing in milliseconds.
cliArguments.keys: The text to type into the element.

description: Simulates typing text into the element. This actions supports typing interval and various clearing options.

examples.description: Type [Lorem ipsum] into [input_enabled] text box, using [ID] locator.
Type [Lorem ipsum] into [input_enabled_with_text] text box, using [ID] locator, after clearing the existing text.
Clear existing text from [input_enabled_with_text] text box, using [ID] locator.
Type [Lorem ipsum] into [input_enabled] text box, using [ID] locator, with [200 milliseconds] between each character.
Type [Lorem ipsum] into [input_enabled_with_text] text box, using [ID] locator, after clearing the existing text using [Force Clear] option.
Sends [CTRL]+[A] into [text_area_enabled] text box, using [ID] locator.

name: SendKeys

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The text to type into the element.

summary: Simulates typing text into the element.
